artist: Artist: Attributed to Giovanni Antonio Burrini
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: Recto: two nude children sit astride a pot and a small animal while a woman on the right with a tambourine reclines, slightly behind them, toward a man on the left playing the flute Verso: very loose line drawing of a standing figure on the left facing a crowd
medium: Recto: Pen and brown ink over red chalk with grey and light red-tinted wash on paper; Verso: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk
title: A Music-Making Satyr Family with Children Playing Around a Goat (recto); Compositional sketch with a Martyrdom and Fleeing Figure (verso)
